blockchain.boostPeerCreate: Channel Boost for {{tokensAmount}} Minds Tokens to {{receiver}}. {{message}}

blockchain.gasLimitTooLow: If the gas limit is too low, the transaction may not be executed.
blockchain.notEnoughGas: You do not have enough gas (ETH) to cover this transaction.
blockchain.gasMustBeBigger: The gas fee must be bigger than 0.
blockchain.canAffordMessage: You currently have {{amount}} ETH. This amount might be insufficient to cover the Ethereum network gas fee for the transaction. Try lowering the gas price.
blockchain.shouldBeReceiver: Should this address be your receiver address for Wire & Boost?
blockchain.downloadPrivate: Download the private key of this wallet
blockchain.deleteWarning: WARNING: this is irreversable and all tokens will be lost
blockchain.deleteConfirmWarning: This is an IRREVERSIBLE action. If you haven't backed up your private key, you may lose all your funds.
blockchain.importKeyNotExist: The private key for this wallet does not exist.
blockchain.importUsingPrivate: Import wallet {{address}} onto Minds using your Private Key?
blockchain.enterPrivateBelow: Enter your private key for your wallet below to import.
blockchain.tapToCreate: Tap here to create a new one.

blockchain.selectTheWallet: Select the wallet you would like to use

boosts.howManyViewsDoYouWant: HOW MANY VIEWS DO YOU WANT?
boosts.targetDescription: Search for the channel you want to boost to.
boosts.priorityDescription: Priority content goes to the front of the line, but costs at least twice the price of a regular boost.
boosts.youCantSelectYourself: You cant select yourself to make a p2p boost
boosts.errorShouldSelectMethod: You should select a payment method.
boosts.errorBetween: You must boost between {{min}} and {{max}} views.
boosts.errorShouldHaveReceiverAddress: Boost target should have a Receiver Address.
boosts.errorShouldParticipateRewards: Boost target should participate in the Rewards program.
boosts.errorCantReceiveTokens: User cannot receive OnChain tokens because they haven't setup an OnChain address. Please retry OffChain.
boosts.errorPayment: Sorry, your payment failed. Please, try again, use another card or wallet
boosts.boostConfirm: You're about to boost {{amount}} views for your content.
boosts.boostConfirmP2p: You're about to send {{amount}} to @{{username}} for reminding your content.
boosts.selectWalletNetworkMessage: Select the wallet you would like to use for this Network Boost.
boosts.selectWalletChannelMessage: Select the wallet you would like to use for this Channel Boost.
boosts.feedsDescription: Your content will appear on newsfeeds across the site.
boosts.offersDescription: Your content will be shared to a specific channel in exchange for USD or tokens or rewards.
boosts.sidebarsDescription: Your content will display on the sidebars throughout the site.

groups.banConfirm: Are you sure? You want to ban this user?

keychain.encryptMessage:
Enter a password that will encrypt the {{keychain}} keychain.
Remember the password or you will be unable to read/write from it.

messenger.logoutMessage: Do you want to logout from messenger?
messenger.changeKeyMessage: Changing your encryption password will cause your previous messages to be unreadable
messenger.notEncryptedMessage: Hey @{{user}}! It looks like you haven't setup your encrypted chat password yet. We recommend that you use a different password than your account password for added security.
messenger.onboardingText: An additional password is required for messenger in order to ensure that your messages are private and fully encrypted.
messenger.setupMessage1: You only need to enter this encryption password once as long as you stay signed in.
messenger.setupMessage2: It is important so that no one other than you and the people you are communicating with can access the content of your messages.
messenger.setupMessage3: By default the content of your messages is fully encrypted. For heightened security you may wish to go to your app settings and turn off push notifications in order to disallow metadata from being tracked.

comments.deleteConfirm:
Do you want to delete this comment?

There's no UNDO.

notification.boostRejected: Your boost &{description}& was rejected for {{reason}}. Your points have been credited back to your wallet.
notification.welcomeChat: Chat securely with your mutual subscriptions.
notification.friends1: You have a match! {{name}} subscribed to you
notification.welcomeBoost: You can gain more reach by boosting your content. Hit the blue boost icon on your posts.
notification.welcomeDiscover: Tap here to discover new channels and media.
notification.welcomePost: Tap here to create a post.
notification.wiredFrom: You have received a wire of {{amount}} from
notification.wiredSubscribed: You have subscribed to wire {{amount}}/month to
notification.wiredSubscribedFrom: You have received a wire subscription of {{amount}}/month from
notification.rewardsStateIncrease:
Congratulations! You just became a {{state}} user.
We've increased your daily token reward multiplier to {{multiplier}}x
notification.rewardsStateDecrease:
We miss you! You just dropped down to a {{state}} user.
Your daily token reward multiplier has been reduced to {{multiplier}}x
notification.rewardsStateDecreaseToday: It's not too late! You will drop down to a {{state}} user by the end of today and your daily token reward multiplier will reduce to {{multiplier}}x. Get liking and commenting to bring your score back up!

payments.cardConfirmMessage: {{confirmMessage}} Do you want to use this credit card?

reports.DMCA: Please submit a DMCA notice to copyright@minds.com.
reports.explain: Please explain why you wish to report this content in a few brief sentences.
reports.weHaveGotYourReport: We've got your report and will check it out soon
reports.errorSubmitting: There was a problem submitting your report
reports.reportAs: Do you want to report this post as:

settings.disableChannelConfirm: Your account will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.deleteChannelConfirm: Your account and all data related to it will be deleted permanently. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.disableDescription: Disabling your account will make your profile invisible. You will also not receive emails or notifications. Your username will be reserved in case you return to Minds.
settings.deleteDescription: Warning: This is not reversible and will result in permanent loss of your channel and all of your data. Your channel will not be recoverable. Your username will be released back to the public.
settings.errorSaving: Error saving setting, please try again
settings.keychainRemoved: Your Ethereum keychain was completely removed.
settings.confirmDeleteKeychain2: Please, confirm once again that you REALLY want to delete your keychain from this phone. There's no UNDO!
settings.confirmDeleteKeychain1: This will delete your Ethereum keychain from this phone. Ensure you backed up the private keys. If you didn't you can lose access to all your funds. There's NO UNDO!
settings.pleaseDeactivate: Please deactivate your account on the desktop

comingSoon.notAvailable: This feature is not available yet.
comingSoon.try:
Try the canary app at
www.minds.com/mobile
comingSoon.notSupported: This feature is not supported by your platform.

attachment.tooLong: Video duration must be less than {{minutes}} minutes

onboarding.welcome1: Before you get started, there are a few things we need to provide you with the best experience.
onboarding.welcome2: First off, how often do you post to social media?
onboarding.hashtagSelect: What topics are you interested in?
onboarding.waitSms: Keep the app visible and we will detect it automatically
onboarding.weDontStorePhone: We do not store your phone number on our servers.
onboarding.suggestedChannelsDescription: Subscribe to some popular channels below based on your interests
onboarding.suggestedGroupsDescription: Join some popular groups below based on your interests
onboarding.tokensCanBeUsed: Tokens can be used to support other channels or boost your content for additional views (1 token = 1,000 views). In order to earn tokens, we will need a phone number to verify that your channel is unique.
onboarding.yourAreReady: You're all setup and ready to go!
onboarding.readyDescription1: Great, you have successfully configured your wallet to receive rewards and OnChain & OffChain payments.
onboarding.readyDescription2: To learn more about tokens and crypto, visit the &{tokens}& section below at any time where you can find tutorials, videos and a FAQ.
onboarding.startEarning: To start earning rewards, you will need to enter a unique phone number.
onboarding.weJustSentCode: We just sent the code to {{phone}} in order to verify that your number is correct.
onboarding.rewardsDescription:
You can earn tokens for your contributions to the Minds network. 
The more interactions on your content, the greater your share of the daily token reward pool to your OffChain address.
onboarding.rewardsNote: Note: Minds does not store the phone numbers you provide. The numbers are hashed using SHA-256 and combined with a salt key for privacy purposes.
onboarding.ensureYouExportKey:
Ensure you EXPORT and back-up your key before uninstalling or wiping the app data, or you will lose your funds.
 Exporting can be done from the Address detail screen.
onboarding.6digitDescription:
To create a new wallet address, please enter a keychain password
that will be used to encrypt your private key onto this device.
onboarding.6digitConfirm: Please confirm once more your keychain password. Once confirmed your wallet will be created on this device and attached to your account.
onboarding.6digitAlreadySetup: Your keychain password is already setup, you just need to confirm the wallet creation. Once confirmed your wallet will be created on this device and attached to your account.
onboarding.passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 6 characters, which can be either alphanumeric or symbols
onboarding.onchainDescription1: To receive OnChain payments from other channels (eg, from a Wire or a Boost), you will need to let us know which address to direct these tokens to.
onboarding.onchainDescription2: This address will be listed in your wallet as your Receiver Address and can be changed at any time.
onboarding.onchainDescription3: OnChain addresses, and their private keys, are saved locally in an encrypted storage space. They will be available to any channel that is currently logged in onto this device.
onboarding.tokensDescription: Tokens are the cryptocurrency used on Minds. Your total balance of tokens will be stored in two different types of addresses.
onboarding.onchainDescription: OnChain payments will be published to the public blockchain and require a small ETH gas fee. You can setup your own private keys or create new wallets.
onboarding.offchainDescription: OffChain payments will not be published to the blockchain and have spending limits. You will receive rewards into this address.

wallet.inviteFriendDescription: Invite a friend and earn rewards
wallet.transactionsDescription: A list of transactions you have made with your addresses
wallet.withdrawDescription: Request a withdrawal of your token rewards to your OnChain address.
wallet.contributionsDescription: Check your rewards and daily contribution scores
wallet.addressesDescription: Configure your crypto addresses and other token related settings

join.rewardsDescription: Rewards Tokens enable creators to earn from interactions on their content. You earn tokens based on a daily contributions pool. At the end of each day, your contributions score will be calculated and you will receive a share of the daily reward pool. In order to verify you are a unique users, we require a phone number to be provided. Your phone number will be securely hashed and sent alongside all interactions to protect against fraud and gaming.
join.note: Note: Minds does not store the phone numbers you provide. The numbers are hashed using SHA-256 and combined with a salt key for encryption and privacy purposes.
join.pleaseEnterCodeDescription: Please enter the code we just sent you, to verify that your number is correct
join.pleaseEnterPhone: Please enter your phone number in order to join the rewards program

withdraw.errorOnlyOnceDay: You can only withdraw once a day
withdraw.youCanRequest:
You can request to withdraw your OffChain token rewards to your OnChain address below.
 Note: a small amount of ETH will be charged to cover the transaction fee.
 Withdrawals may take up to a few hours to complete
withdraw.holdingMessage: {{amount}} tokens are unavailable due to credit card payment. They will be released after 30 days the payment occurred.
withdraw.errorAmountNegative: Amount should be a positive number

wire.amountMonthDescription: THIS POST CAN ONLY BE SEEN BY SUPPORTERS WHO WIRE {{amount}}/MONTH TO @{{name}}
wire.pleaseTryUnlockingMessage: Please try unlocking this post after it gets processed. We estimate it may take around 5 minutes.
wire.onlySupportersWhoWire: Only supporters who wire you over {{amount}}/month will see this post.
wire.wireMeOver: Wire me over {{amount}}/month to see this post.
wire.supportMessage: Support &{name}& by sending them tokens. Once you send them the amount listed in the tiers, you can receive rewards if they are offered. Otherwise, it's a donation.
wire.youHaveSent: You have sent &{amount}& in the last month.
wire.errorSendingWire: There was a problem sending wire
wire.selectWalletMessage: Select the wallet you would like to use for this Wire.
wire.preApproveMessage: We need you to pre-approve Minds Wire wallet for the recurring wire transactions.
